A7. Moreso, listening to your customers and responding makes customers feel EMPOWERED. Empowered customers spend more. #PowerofPrecision
Q7 - Let your EMPLOYEES help mold the creative vision for your brand. If you've hired empathetic, they'll guide you well. #PowerofPrecision
Q6: Start by being brilliant at the basics. Don't try and be amazing. Be CONSISTENT. Be Transparent. Be honest. #PowerofPrecision

Q4. JUST BE 1% BETTER THAN EXPECTED! I don't need you to walk on fire or redefine Pi. Hell, just SMILE, for starters! #PowerofPrecision
A3. In the end, knowing your customers' wants via tech and being just slightly better than expected will gain you the win. #PowerofPrecision
A3. likes/dislikes and catering to exactly what they want is made EASIER by tech, as is their ability to share their exp! #PowerofPrecision

The @MTA #stuckNTrain approaches Times Square. The lights from the FEMA trailers are blinding. We're different than when we started.
Back in the darkness. Somewhere under 31st Street, the smell of hot dogs. It's a trap! #stuckNTrain
28th Street!! The light!! Half the train has crawled out to the stairs. I can't leave. I'm a product of the system now. #StuckNtrain
A group of Stuyvesant high school students starts to cry. "Your STEM won't save us now," mutters a LaGuardia music student. #stuckNTrain
The man next to me has taken off his tie and is making a lasso from it. "Rat burgers tonight," he whispers," licking his lips. #stuckNTrain
"Yo man, you got an iPhone charger on you?" It has begun. The world will not be the same when this is over. #stuckNtrain
I have taken my gym sneakers from my bag. The laces can be made into weapons for protection if needed. #stuckNtrain
